sentences.sentence: Joyce took especial care to include her.
sentences.translation: 乔伊斯特别留意把她加进来。

sentences.sentence: The lecture will be of especial interest to history students.
sentences.translation: 学历史的学生会对这个讲座特别有兴趣。

sentences.sentence: The prevalence of black and Asian faces among those targeted has caused especial resentment.
sentences.translation: 黑人和亚洲人的面孔在那些目标人群中普遍存在，这引起了特别的不满。
